reviews.review:
Ist ein gutes Spiel.
Mal fÃ¼r zwischendurch echt cool.

The most intense hide and seek match ever played.
The best part is that you don't just 'tap' your friend but you kill them :)
10/10 would recommend this game.
I lost all my perks and offerings, been restarting DBD many times and steam too. But to no avail, all of it is gone. Is there no way to retrieve it back?
Ğ˜Ğ³Ñ€Ğ° Ğ´Ğ»Ñ Ñ‚Ğ¸Ğ¼Ñ‹ :Ğ— ĞšÑ‚Ğ¾ Ğ² ÑĞ¾Ğ»Ğ¾ , Ñ‚Ğ¾Ñ‚ Ğ»Ğ¾Ñ… :Ñ

Il gioco sarebbe anche divertente se non ci fossero le persone con tanti di quei potenziamenti (o forse erano cheater ma mi sembra strano) che durante una partita durata 2 minuti e 47 secondi sono riusciti ad accendere tutti i generatori in un colpo

Va beh, a parte i giocatori espertissimi il gioco si presenta bene, ancora alcuni bug con le tracce e i movimenti, assassini e sopravvissuti mal equilibrati, visione dei killer che va a farsi benedire ogni volta che lanciano un attacco e ci vuole ancora molto tempo per trovare i giocatori (pregando il dio che non siano cheater o potentissimi) 

No aspettate vi giuro che ora parlo dei pro, la grafica Ã¨ piacevole e gli assassini sono molto fedeli alle loro rispettive controparti originali (ma non i loro movimenti), puÃ² essere divertente giocare con gli amici e poco con gli sconosciuti eeeee... Niente non mi viene altro in mente di positivo, forse il costo quando ci sono i saldi
Great game, but i got character reset when play it after 10/11 hours
Best game of hide and seek.
Good game all and all, gave me a few good spooks
Oh god !! it's game so fun so much I like it's game DBDL because it's was first game it my purchase come to played away like like....
for all you people thinking about getting it dont think just do it

No sÃ© que mierda pasa con el juego, descargo el nuevo contenido y no me deja jugar... Supuestamente hay algo malo en los archivos locales... Vuelvo a descargar 8 gigas de mierda... Logro entrar, estoy en una partida, me lo estoy cogiendo al asesino y de pronto me pide que me salga por que algo esta mal...

OSEA ARREGLEN SU JUEGO DE MIERDA... Y DEJEN DE NERFEAR A LOS ASESINOS, ESPECIALMENTE POR LO QUE LE HICIERON A LA *RUINA*
Is a decent game. Gets repetitive over time
this game is fun for like a few hours and then it just becomes BS every game. An insane amount of issues that go unresolved and  even more new bugs every update. Stay away.
The game may have some balance issues but if you can get a group of friends together its one of the most fun 4 player gaming sessions Ive had in a long time.

3k plus hours later and i just dont really know what to say about this game anymore. The balance and overall game experience is constantly changing. Annoying bugs and game mechanics are being changed and added constantly. I love what dbd is trying to be but its just so frustrating and the devs have made it very clear their main focus is to keep adding more and more content. Making money without really fixing the big (or small) problems. That or they are just really really bad at what they do. The rest of the game suffers on every level. Nobody is happy, both sides can be incredibly bias toward the health of the game. If only both sides could just see the entire game is badly designed and its not their fault its the devs. 

These devs are like those phone game / app scams. The games where you have to grind and pay a bunch of money to play and enjoy the actual game. Except this game isnt even free to play. You pay 20 bucks and if a meta perk goes onto a licensed killer/surv youll have to buy him too. But remember that meta perk could be nerfed at any time! And if you want cosmetics, youre going to have to pay lots of money. Remember when games had lots of cosmetics WITH the game? Those were the days! This game pretends to be cheap but for the full experience youre going to spend lots on DLC bc they released it as "early access" im finally seeing the whole early access trend for what it is. An excuse to rush an unfinished game somewhat cheaper and then making you pay for any more content way beyond your typical 60 dollar game. AH i miss the old gaming days. 


I love the base game and i love my character and changing her outfits all the time but im not enjoying playing either side for a multitude of reasons. Its not even worth explaining all the issues bc when im finally done with that exhaustive list itll all be different in the next 3 months. Right when you think you like the state of the game something changes it drastically. Im tired of it. Most of my friends dont play anymore. The game pisses my husband off too much to play it with me lol. The devs have shown they have NO idea how to fix the problems and would rather pump out more kill myself inducing content. I dont know anyone in real life that would put up with this game's issues. If only the devs would finally use the money they are earning to buy competent people to fix their game. 

If you are wondering if you can enjoy this game, ask yourself, "Do I hate myself?" If the answer is yes, yes, you might be able to stand this game. COME JOIN THE CLUB

Buen juego, lo han mejorado con el tiempo y se agradece.Pero aun deben crear servidores dedicados porque depender del internet de los demas no es para nada efectivo, optimizar mas el juego y mejorar los reportes, porque no es raro encontrarse campers.
Pero mas haya de eso lo disfruto mucho.
Game is aight. It's really fun, but don't expect a lot. Devs are willing to let the game die, but until then they're pumping out steady content as of the moment

Took a few years but i got my shit back
good game, i literally have never played anything but survivor and the new updates "don't ruin the game" or anything like what the idiots in the forums say

Aprovado

ObservaÃ§Ãµes: O jogo Ã© bom, da pra se divertir bastante e jogar com amigos. E tambÃ©m apresenta uma boa variedade de personagens e perks.

Fun game. What makes it really enjoyable is when you get stuck in literally everything, get downed by killers from 25 feet away, and to top it off, get your saves deleted every few months. Gr8 game with more bugs than it should have considering they're still making DLC for it.

It's a pretty fun game, the community has a bad rep but can actually be some pretty cool people, offering tips to newer players and providing a generally positive atmosphere.

Playing as a survivor can be genuinely terrifying when up against a solid killer when you just get started, but that novelty kinda wears off after a while and it feels like a slightly spooky game of hide-and-seek. Still a very fun game of slightly spooky hide-and-seek, though.

As a killer you end up chasing people around and running in circles a lot trying to smack people and give them to your tentacle-god-thing. This tentacle-god-thing will only accept people if they're served to him on hooks because reasons. It's pretty fun if you're into that sort of thing (no judgement).

The gameplay can get pretty repetitive after a while, and at higher levels people start employing the same strategies over and over (because they work) and then things start to get even more repetitive. Plus the progression system is really geared towards frequent players, so you won't be as effective a killer/survivor if you don't play a lot.

There's a solid variety of killers to choose from, with wildly varying abilities, while the survivors have some differing traits while still feeling fairly similar. They all still repair generators and try not to get smacked and sacrificed.

All in all it's a pretty fun game to play once in a while, so the gameplay doesn't get too old, but it does incentivize you to play more if you're into that sort of thing.

tl;dr, community's actually pretty nice, survivor gameplay is spooky for new players but becomes less spooky over time, killers are "It" in this game of hide-and-seek, gameplay gets repetitive, progression is geared towards frequent players, pretty fun, 6.5/10.

Die Survivor tebaggen nur,provozieren den Killer,blocken den Killer mit dem KÃ¶rper und schreiben nach dem Match nur blÃ¶dsinn in den Chat. 
Die Killer blocken auch,beleidigen nach der Runde teilweise echt aufs Ã¼belste,campen,sluggen und tunneln nur. Halten sich an keine Regeln,genauso wenig die Surv.

What an awesome game!! I was lucky enough to try it for free. I was so impressed by the game that I bought it immediately afterwards! Being a fan of the horror genre, I love being able to stalk and kill "helpless" victims. Don't even get me started about hanging them up on hooks. It appears that there is no shortage of DLC content too, so the game should stay fresh for a while!

The game is addictive and fun to play. Licensed characters and constant updates make it even better.
The biggest downside is that it has become toxic because of school kids who are bullied at school and who take out their frustrations in the game. There are teams, who deliberately demote their ranks to troll low rank killers (2 out of 3 games).

and it's like, when your parent find out that you are skipping school and looking for you to punish you.
